translations: 邪恶的；罪深的；不公平的；不公正的

sentences.sentence: But actually who is righteous or unrighteous?
sentences.translation: 但是，究竟谁正义或不正义？

sentences.sentence: Instead, throw off the unrighteous behavior.
sentences.translation: 而要去扔下那非正义的行为。

sentences.sentence: Deliver me, o my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.
sentences.translation: 我的神阿，求你救我脱离恶人的手，脱离不义和残暴之人的手。
